ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc70:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc70:1.2_0: At that time the novice monastic Kaṇṭaka had the following bad and erroneous view:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc70:1.3_0: “As I understand the Teaching of the Buddha, the things he calls obstructive are unable to obstruct one who indulges in them.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc70:1.4_0: Several mendicants heard that the novice monastic Kaṇṭaka had the following bad and erroneous view:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc70:1.5_0: “As I understand the Teaching of the Buddha, the things he calls obstructive are unable to obstruct one who indulges in them.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc70:1.6_1: They went to him and asked,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc70:1.7_0: “Is it true, Reverend Kaṇṭaka, that you have such a view?”

ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc70:1.12_0: The Buddha says that sensual pleasures give little gratification and much suffering and distress, and they are all the more full of drawbacks.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc70:1.13_0: But even though the monks corrected Kaṇṭaka like this, he stubbornly held on to that bad and erroneous view, and he continued to insist on it.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc70:1.15_0: Since those mendicants were unable to make him give up that view, they went to the Buddha.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc70:1.15_1: They then went to the Buddha and told him what had happened.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc70:1.16_0: Soon afterwards the Buddha had the Sangha gathered and questioned the Kaṇṭaka:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc70:1.17_0: “Is it true, Kaṇṭaka, that you have such a view?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc70:1.18_0: that you have such a view?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc70:1.20_0: “Foolish man, whom do you think I have taught like this?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc70:1.21_0: Haven’t I said in many ways that obstructive acts are obstructive, and that they really do obstruct the one who performs them?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc70:1.22_0: I’ve said that sensual pleasures give little gratification and much suffering and distress, and they are all the more full of drawbacks.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc70:1.23_0: With the similes of a skeleton ...
